item.description:
I want to continue getting everyone out on the trails this Spring.  I am still recovering from my achilles tendon injury so the pace and difficulty on this event low.

This is a 100% beginners event.  No experience or special equipment required.

We will meet at the parking area for Fisher Meadow Recreation Center in Avon.  This is the same area as the athletic fields for Avon Old Farms School.  We will take the red trail on a big loop around the recreation area.  The exact path will depend on the level of the water when we get there.  This a ramble through the woods between the Farmington River and Spring Pond.  There is a really cool pump house at the north end of the pond.  We will stop there for a snack and break.

I image we will be out about 2 hours and this will be no more than 3 miles in distance.  The terrain is a woods trail but pretty flat and rolling.  Sneakers are ok but you will get dirty feet in general.  Bring water and a snack in maybe a small pack.

As always with me, no dogs.  Children would be ok but must be able to finish the hike.

The address is 850 Old Farms Rd. Avon CT 06001.  Mapquest link below.

http://mapq.st/f46VUn

 

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Count me in" or "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Silver Jeep Liberty at 850 Old Farms Rd Avon CT 06001
item.why: Its now Spring and we should be outside.
